lines.text: I'm afraid of being unhappy.
Unhappiness ain't so bad... kind of makes happiness all the keener.
Frank, I can't have you running off like this.
If you really love me, come with me to San Francisco tonight. Will you?
Yes.

[He's just arrived home drunk]
You know what happened to me today? A very funny thing. I was asleep in a nice, comfortable gutter. I mean, there were no rents to pay, no novels to write, no nothing... But all of a sudden I remembered that I was a man of responsibilities. Ha ha! A man of responsibilities - that's me!
You know, sometimes a man goes from wanting too much, to wanting nothing. He ought to do it gradually, or he gets all mixed up.

[Asking the City Editor for a raise]
I'm a married man with responsibilities, and all I'm asking you for is enough money to live like a human being.
You can't come around here complaining about "hard times" when you smell like a saloon most of the time!
Ha! You're a fine one to preach! Why, you've had your nose in a whiskey bottle so long it looks like an old cork!
I've had enough out of you, Medlin. You're fired!

[Slightly taken aback]
Fired?... That's fine. I'll go get myself a decent job, now. Merry Christmas!

[In his goodbye note]
Dear Louise - Our love is dying a tawdry death - my fault - so at midnight I ship out for a new horizon. Good-bye. - Frank

[He's just returned to San Francisco after a long time away at sea]
You look like someone they forgot to bury.
They didn't forget - I just wasn't there when they came around.
Oh, please, I'm quite harmless really.
I think you are.
Good thing we elect a President only once every four years.

[Anxious to know Tim's opinion of his novel in progress]
Well, are you through?
Yes.
Pretty bad, ay?
Well, I'm no literary critic.

[laughs derisively]
You don't have to be. All you've got to be is be able to smell.
Rose, maybe when a man has everything he wants, it's time to die. He waits too long; it's liable to turn sour on him.

[to Grace]
But if you love a man, you've got to understand his weaknesses as well as take pride in his strengths. and if you love him, you'll fight for him 'til you know he belongs to another woman.
